name: Are You There? (Timothy Lim)
description:
Are You There?

You awaken in a very unforgiving desert, unsure what to do against the buffeting sandstorm and eerie creatures. You remember that you were looking for something, but you're not quite  sure what it was. Still, you are determined to weather through this dangerous, labyrinthine  desert to find it.

Game Programming and Art By:

Timothy Lim

Xiaoli Tang

Music and Sound Effects By:

Sean Morrow

Gabriel DeBenedict

Markel Badallo

Mac Users:

Please check README.txt when things go south trying to play the game!
